title: Authentication
description: Pre-built authentication solution that handles user registration, login and all common authentication workflows.

title: Compose Components
description: Save time and effort with our collection of beautiful components, build great interfaces in minutes.

title: Navigation
description: Built-in navigation using Voyager. Covers all the basic navigation scenarios with transitions.

title: Tracking
description: We provide an abstract component to track every aspect of your app in a simple way.

title: Version Catalog
description: Define all libraries, versions and plugins in one TOML file to reuse across multiplatform apps.

title: CI Ready
description: Basic scripts for your continuous integration builds. Key component for any Production application.

title: Debug Menu
description: Built-in debug menu were you can manage all the important things of your apps.

title: Internationalization
description: FIGS - Translations are very important, also the way are displayed to avoid issues.

title: CRUD API
description: The template provides a built-in CRUD API as an example for your APIs documented in OpenAPI.

title: Material 3
description: All components and screens were created using Material 3 as the base.

title: Ktor Client/Server
description: Use the standard Ktor client and server apis to build your apps.

title: Data Storage
description: Store all the data on every platform in a reliable way.
